information.quote: It is impossible to summarize what I can do on one piece of paper.

intro.title: What makes me so special?
content: I’ve been passionate about a lot of things in my life. And it wasn’t until recently that I discovered the common thread in all of it: learning new things is exciting! And it’s because of that quality, that I managed to gain a wide variety of skills.

It’s the combination of all my skills that makes me an asset in projects. Improving usability, user test a prototype, writing code or do a presentation in front of 100 people, I think it's all fascinating.
I had the opportunity to see a company grow from 5 to 160 people. This helped a lot in developing the soft skills needed in both smaller and bigger teams!

experience.title: My portfolio
experience.description: I'm very proud of the things I made. Want to take a look at my portfolio?

education.title: A-style: Master project
education.description: Not a part of my portfolio, but a project I spend a lot of time on. An online wardrobe to mix and match clothes: Make combinations while shopping or when you already bought them.

expertise.title: Contact me
expertise.description: How much can a bar-chart actually tell you? I should elaborate on this, so get in touch!

passions.title: Add me on instagram!
passions.description: It might come as a surprise, but I have some cool stuff I do when I'm not working. Go, and follow me on instagram!
